leaf_cluster.leaf_cluster_name: 环境-污染/生态建模与监测生态
leaf_cluster.task_chain: 采集→清洗→预测/告警→解释→报告
leaf_cluster.tool_form: 时序库 + 监控 + 可视化

tools.name: LBLRTM
tools.one_line_profile: Line-By-Line Radiative Transfer Model for atmospheric modeling
tools.detailed_description: A radiative transfer model derived from the Fast Atmospheric Signature Code (FASCODE). It is used for calculating atmospheric transmittance and radiance with high spectral resolution, essential for atmospheric and environmental research.

tools.name: MFD-mobile
tools.one_line_profile: Multi-temporal function-based dasymetric interpolation for mobile phone data
tools.detailed_description: A Python implementation of the Multi-temporal function-based dasymetric method (MFD) for enhancing the spatial accuracy of mobile phone data, as described in Järv, Tenkanen & Toivonen (2017).

tools.name: rasterAutocorr
tools.one_line_profile: R package for calculating spatial autocorrelation on 2D rasters
tools.detailed_description: A lightweight R package designed to quickly calculate spatial autocorrelation metrics on 2D raster data, facilitating spatial statistical analysis in environmental studies.

tools.name: RFSI
tools.one_line_profile: Random Forest Spatial Interpolation R package
tools.detailed_description: An R package implementing Random Forest for Spatial Interpolation (RFSI), allowing for machine learning-based spatial prediction and mapping.

tools.name: Rmeteo
tools.one_line_profile: Spatio-temporal geostatistical mapping of meteorological data
tools.detailed_description: An R package focused on spatio-temporal geostatistical mapping specifically tailored for meteorological data analysis.

tools.name: ESResNet
tools.one_line_profile: Environmental Sound Classification model based on Visual Domain Models
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of ESResNet, a deep learning model for environmental sound classification that leverages visual domain models, as described in the associated research paper.

tools.name: GeoReVi
tools.one_line_profile: Geological Reservoir Virtualization tool
tools.detailed_description: A C# based tool for the virtualization and visualization of geological reservoirs, aiding in geological analysis and modeling.

tools.name: cell2fate
tools.one_line_profile: Inference of RNA velocity modules for cell fate prediction
tools.detailed_description: A tool for inferring RNA velocity modules to predict cell fates and integrate with spatial and regulatory models, useful in systems biology and spatial transcriptomics.

tools.name: PHES-ODM
tools.one_line_profile: Public Health Environmental Surveillance Open Data Model and tools
tools.detailed_description: A data model, dictionary, and set of support tools for public health environmental surveillance, facilitating data standardization and analysis.

tools.name: TPML
tools.one_line_profile: Unified machine learning method integrating spatial autocorrelation and property similarity
tools.detailed_description: A machine learning method implementation that integrates spatial autocorrelation laws and property similarity principles for enhanced spatial analysis.

tools.name: pycirk
tools.one_line_profile: Modeling Circular Economy policy in Environmentally Extended Input-Output Analysis
tools.detailed_description: A Python package to model Circular Economy policy and technological interventions using Environmentally Extended Input-Output Analysis (EEIOA), specifically designed to work with mrSUTs (EXIOBASE).

tools.name: STAWnet
tools.one_line_profile: End-to-end deep learning model for spatial-temporal prediction
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of STAWnet, an end-to-end deep learning model designed for spatial-temporal prediction tasks.

tools.name: Spatially-aware GNN
tools.one_line_profile: Spatially-aware Graph Neural Networks for molecular profile prediction in histopathology
tools.detailed_description: Official code for the paper 'Spatially-aware Graph Neural Networks and Cross-level Molecular Profile Prediction in Colon Cancer Histopathology', providing tools for analyzing spatial patterns in medical imaging.

tools.name: pygeostat
tools.one_line_profile: Python interface for geostatistics
tools.detailed_description: A Python library providing an interface for geostatistical analysis, facilitating data processing, visualization, and modeling in geostatistics.

tools.name: STIGCN
tools.one_line_profile: Spatial-Temporal Interaction-aware Graph Convolution Network
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of STIGCN, a model for pedestrian trajectory prediction that captures spatial-temporal interactions using Graph Convolution Networks.

tools.name: ST-LLM
tools.one_line_profile: Spatial-Temporal Large Language Model for Traffic Prediction
tools.detailed_description: Official implementation of ST-LLM, a Large Language Model adapted for spatial-temporal traffic prediction tasks.

tools.name: SfmLearner-Pytorch
tools.one_line_profile: PyTorch implementation of SfmLearner for Structure from Motion
tools.detailed_description: A PyTorch implementation of the SfmLearner framework for unsupervised learning of depth and ego-motion from video, useful in photogrammetry and spatial reconstruction.

tools.name: Building-Regulariser
tools.one_line_profile: Library for cleaning and regularising building footprints in geospatial data
tools.detailed_description: A Python library designed to clean and regularize building footprints in geospatial datasets, aligning edges to principal directions and simplifying polygons for accurate spatial analysis.

tools.name: H3-Pandas
tools.one_line_profile: Integration of H3 spatial indexing with GeoPandas and Pandas
tools.detailed_description: A library that integrates Uber's H3 hexagonal hierarchical spatial indexing system with Pandas and GeoPandas dataframes, facilitating efficient spatial data handling.

tools.name: pyinterpolate
tools.one_line_profile: Python library for Kriging and Variogram Analysis
tools.detailed_description: A Python library for spatial interpolation, offering implementations of Kriging, Poisson Kriging, and Variogram Analysis for geostatistical research.

tools.name: GEM
tools.one_line_profile: Global Environmental Multiscale numerical weather prediction model
tools.detailed_description: The Global Environmental Multiscale (GEM) model is a numerical weather prediction model developed by Environment and Climate Change Canada for operational weather forecasting and research.

tools.name: eodal
tools.one_line_profile: Library for Earth Observation data analysis and processing
tools.detailed_description: A Python library designed for the analysis of Earth Observation (EO) data, providing tools for handling spatial data, processing satellite imagery, and integrating with other geospatial libraries.

tools.name: TS-EMO
tools.one_line_profile: Thompson sampling efficient multiobjective optimization algorithm
tools.detailed_description: A MATLAB implementation of Thompson Sampling Efficient Multiobjective Optimization (TSEMO), designed for solving expensive black-box multiobjective optimization problems often encountered in scientific modeling and calibration.

tools.name: spatstat-interface
tools.one_line_profile: Python interface for the R spatstat package
tools.detailed_description: A Python wrapper using rpy2 to interface with the 'spatstat' R package, enabling Python users to perform spatial point pattern analysis using spatstat's extensive functionality.

tools.name: G2S
tools.one_line_profile: Flexible Multiple-Point Statistics (MPS) framework
tools.detailed_description: A C++ framework for Multiple-Point Statistics (MPS) simulation, allowing for the generation of geostatistical realizations based on training images.

tools.name: GStatSim
tools.one_line_profile: Geostatistical simulation tools for glaciology and geospatial data
tools.detailed_description: A Python package providing geostatistical tools for interpolation and simulation, specifically tailored for applications in glaciology and other geospatial fields.

tools.name: Spatial-Statistics
tools.one_line_profile: Methods for spatial statistics including Fast Adaptive KDE
tools.detailed_description: A repository containing implementations of spatial statistical methods, notably Fast and Adaptive Kernel Density Estimation (KDE) for processing large point datasets.

tools.name: rgeoda
tools.one_line_profile: R library for spatial data analysis based on GeoDa
tools.detailed_description: An R package that provides an interface to the GeoDa library for spatial data analysis, including spatial autocorrelation, clustering, and regression.

tools.name: GSTools
tools.one_line_profile: Geostatistical toolbox for random fields and variogram estimation
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive Python toolbox for geostatistical analysis, offering functionality for random field generation, variogram estimation, covariance modeling, and kriging.

tools.name: GSTools-Core
tools.one_line_profile: Core algorithms for GSTools implemented in Rust
tools.detailed_description: The Rust implementation of the core computational algorithms used by the GSTools Python package, providing high-performance geostatistical calculations.

tools.name: PyKrige
tools.one_line_profile: Kriging Toolkit for Python
tools.detailed_description: A Python library for 2D and 3D Kriging interpolation, supporting ordinary, universal, and other variants of Kriging for spatial data analysis.

tools.name: geodata
tools.one_line_profile: Geospatial data collection and pre-analysis tools
tools.detailed_description: A Python package providing tools for collecting, handling, and performing preliminary analysis on geospatial data.

tools.name: gnssanalysis
tools.one_line_profile: Python module for GNSS data analysis
tools.detailed_description: A Python module developed by Geoscience Australia for the analysis of Global Navigation Satellite System (GNSS) data, supporting geodetic and spatial analysis tasks.

tools.name: GeostatsPy
tools.one_line_profile: Python package for spatial data analytics and geostatistics
tools.detailed_description: A Python package that reimplements GSLIB (Geostatistical Library) functionality, providing a comprehensive set of tools for spatial data analytics, geostatistics, and visualization.

tools.name: geostatsr
tools.one_line_profile: Geostatistical utilities in R
tools.detailed_description: An R package providing utilities and functions for geostatistical analysis, accompanying educational materials but serving as a functional toolset.

tools.name: geoutils
tools.one_line_profile: Library for analysis of georeferenced rasters and vectors
tools.detailed_description: A Python library for handling and analyzing georeferenced rasters, vectors, and point clouds, simplifying common geospatial operations.

tools.name: xdem
tools.one_line_profile: Analysis of digital elevation models (DEMs)
tools.detailed_description: A Python library dedicated to the post-processing and analysis of Digital Elevation Models (DEMs), including coregistration, bias correction, and uncertainty analysis.

tools.name: GPUParallelSpatialAdaptiveKDE
tools.one_line_profile: GPU-Parallel Spatially Adaptive Kernel Density Estimation
tools.detailed_description: A C++ implementation of Spatially Adaptive Kernel Density Estimation (KDE) accelerated using GPU parallelism, designed for efficient point pattern analysis.

tools.name: GeoHealth
tools.one_line_profile: Interface for public health spatial analysis and mapping
tools.detailed_description: A tool designed for public health applications to import data, create incidence or density maps, perform spatial blurring for privacy, and run statistical analyses.

tools.name: CAST
tools.one_line_profile: Caret Applications for Spatio-Temporal models
tools.detailed_description: An R package that extends the 'caret' framework for spatio-temporal modeling, providing methods for forward feature selection and target-oriented cross-validation in spatial contexts.

tools.name: SoilGrids250m
tools.one_line_profile: Global spatial predictions of soil properties and classes at 250 m resolution
tools.detailed_description: A framework and set of scripts for generating global spatial predictions of soil properties and classes using machine learning and soil profile data.

tools.name: STcompare
tools.one_line_profile: R package for comparing spatial gene expression patterns across spatial transcriptomics datasets
tools.detailed_description: An R package designed to compare spatial gene expression patterns across different spatial transcriptomics (ST) datasets, facilitating analysis of spatial heterogeneity.

tools.name: spatial_DFA
tools.one_line_profile: Spatial dynamic factor analysis for estimating spatiotemporal density dependence in community dynamics
tools.detailed_description: A C++ tool for performing spatial dynamic factor analysis, specifically designed to estimate spatiotemporal density dependence in ecological community dynamics.

tools.name: AMK-MCS-AEFF
tools.one_line_profile: Active-learning method for reliability analysis based on multi-fidelity kriging model
tools.detailed_description: A MATLAB implementation of an active-learning method for reliability analysis utilizing a multi-fidelity kriging surrogate model.

tools.name: InterpolateR
tools.one_line_profile: High-performance R package for spatial interpolation of environmental data
tools.detailed_description: An R package designed for fast and scalable spatial interpolation of grid- or point-based environmental data, leveraging data.table and terra.

tools.name: Geographical-Gaussian-Process-Regression
tools.one_line_profile: Geographical Gaussian Process Regression (GGPR) model for spatial prediction
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of the Geographical Gaussian Process Regression (GGPR) model for spatial prediction and exploratory spatial data analysis.

tools.name: ClimateBase.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Tools to analyze and manipulate spatiotemporal climate data
tools.detailed_description: A Julia package providing tools to analyze and manipulate climate data, specifically handling spatiotemporal structures.

tools.name: GeoStats.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Extensible framework for geospatial data science and geostatistical modeling
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive and extensible framework for geospatial data science and geostatistical modeling, fully written in Julia.

tools.name: GeoStatsBase.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Base package for the GeoStats.jl framework
tools.detailed_description: The core package defining the base types and interfaces for the GeoStats.jl geostatistical framework.

tools.name: GeoStatsFunctions.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Geostatistical functions for the GeoStats.jl framework
tools.detailed_description: A collection of geostatistical functions (variograms, covariances, etc.) used within the GeoStats.jl framework.

tools.name: GeoStatsImages.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Training images for geostatistical simulation
tools.detailed_description: A dataset package providing training images for geostatistical simulation algorithms within the GeoStats.jl ecosystem.

tools.name: ImageQuilting.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Fast image quilting simulation solver for the GeoStats.jl framework
tools.detailed_description: A solver for the GeoStats.jl framework that implements fast image quilting for geostatistical simulation.

tools.name: TuringPatterns.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Turing patterns simulation solver for the GeoStats.jl framework
tools.detailed_description: A solver for generating Turing patterns within the GeoStats.jl framework, useful for spatial simulation.

tools.name: PAK-Bn
tools.one_line_profile: Implementation of Probability-Adaptive Kriging in n-Ball
tools.detailed_description: Source code implementation of the Probability-Adaptive Kriging in n-Ball (PAK-Bn) method for spatial interpolation and reliability analysis.

tools.name: Kriging-and-GE-Kriging-model-toolbox
tools.one_line_profile: Gradient-enhanced Kriging surrogate model toolbox
tools.detailed_description: A MATLAB toolbox for creating and using Kriging and Gradient-Enhanced Kriging surrogate models.

tools.name: SATCN
tools.one_line_profile: Self-Attention Temporal Convolutional Network for Kriging
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of SATCN (Self-Attention Temporal Convolutional Network) applied to Kriging tasks for spatiotemporal data.

tools.name: X-ORGIN
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline to estimate expansion origins from derived SNPs incorporating temporal and spatial heterogeneity
tools.detailed_description: A pipeline to estimate expansion origins from derived SNPs, incorporating temporal and spatial heterogeneity, useful for estimating refugia for species.

tools.name: TyphoFormer
tools.one_line_profile: LLM-Augmented Spatial-Temporal Transformer for Typhoon Track Prediction
tools.detailed_description: A model implementation using LLM-augmented Spatial-Temporal Transformers for predicting typhoon tracks.

tools.name: VPint
tools.one_line_profile: Value propagation-based spatial/spatio-temporal interpolation
tools.detailed_description: A Python package for value propagation-based spatial and spatio-temporal interpolation.

tools.name: apsimNGpy
tools.one_line_profile: Python interface for the APSIM Next Generation crop and environmental simulation model
tools.detailed_description: A Python library that provides an interface to the APSIM Next Generation crop and environmental simulation model, enabling faster execution and automation.

tools.name: N-GSBSS
tools.one_line_profile: Improved Gray Matter Surface based Spatial Statistics in Neuroimaging Studies
tools.detailed_description: A MATLAB tool for improved Gray Matter Surface based Spatial Statistics (N-GSBSS) used in neuroimaging analysis.

tools.name: Latent-Diffusion-Model-for-Conditional-Reservoir-Facies-Generation
tools.one_line_profile: Latent Diffusion Model for Conditional Reservoir Facies Generation
tools.detailed_description: PyTorch implementation of a Latent Diffusion Model for generating conditional reservoir facies, useful in geological modeling.

tools.name: Efficient-GP-Regression-via-Kalman-Filtering
tools.one_line_profile: Efficient spatio-temporal Gaussian Process regression via iterative Kalman Filtering
tools.detailed_description: Code implementing efficient spatio-temporal Gaussian Process regression using iterative Kalman Filtering to handle the temporal component.

tools.name: MobilityDB
tools.one_line_profile: Geospatial trajectory data management and analysis platform built on PostgreSQL and PostGIS
tools.detailed_description: A geospatial trajectory data management and analysis platform that extends PostgreSQL and PostGIS to handle moving object data.

tools.name: HIVE-OS
tools.one_line_profile: Tools to process beehive health data and correlate with NASA Earth observations
tools.detailed_description: Software to ingest beehive health data, convert it to spatial formats, and provide scripts to access and correlate NASA Earth observation data via Google Earth Engine.

tools.name: cityTairMapping
tools.one_line_profile: Spatial interpolation of point air temperature data using Random Forest and satellite data
tools.detailed_description: A workflow for spatial interpolation of point air temperature (Tair) data from weather stations using a Random Forest model incorporating satellite and other predictor data.

tools.name: patternogram
tools.one_line_profile: Visualization tool for spatial autocorrelation patterns
tools.detailed_description: An R package designed to visualize spatial autocorrelation, aiding in the analysis of spatial patterns and dependencies in geostatistical data.

tools.name: Pandas-Bokeh
tools.one_line_profile: Bokeh plotting backend for Pandas and GeoPandas
tools.detailed_description: A library that provides a Bokeh plotting backend for Pandas and GeoPandas, enabling interactive visualization of dataframes and geospatial data for scientific analysis.

tools.name: GammaRay
tools.one_line_profile: Graphical interface for GSLib and geomodeling algorithms
tools.detailed_description: A graphical user interface (GUI) for GSLib (Geostatistical Software Library) and other geomodeling algorithms, facilitating geostatistical analysis and drift analysis.

tools.name: esri2gpd
tools.one_line_profile: Scraper for ArcGIS Server REST API to GeoPandas
tools.detailed_description: A Python tool to scrape features from the ArcGIS Server REST API and convert them directly into a GeoPandas GeoDataFrame, facilitating the acquisition of geospatial data for analysis.

tools.name: intSDM
tools.one_line_profile: Reproducible species distribution models using INLA
tools.detailed_description: An R package for creating reproducible species distribution models (SDM) using Integrated Nested Laplace Approximation (INLA), specifically designed for ecological modeling.

tools.name: PyCUP
tools.one_line_profile: Environmental model calibration and uncertainty analysis package
tools.detailed_description: An open-source Python package for environmental model calibration and uncertainty analysis, utilizing heuristic algorithms and the GLUE framework.

tools.name: geoplot
tools.one_line_profile: High-level geospatial data visualization library
tools.detailed_description: A high-level Python library for geospatial data visualization, extending Cartopy and Matplotlib to provide an easy-to-use interface for creating maps.

tools.name: RuFaS
tools.one_line_profile: Whole-farm modeling environment for dairy production
tools.detailed_description: Ruminant Farm Systems (RuFaS) is a whole-farm modeling environment that simulates dairy farm production and its environmental impact, aiding in agricultural and ecological research.

tools.name: RipleyK
tools.one_line_profile: Ripley's K function calculation for spatial statistics
tools.detailed_description: A Python implementation for calculating the Ripley's K function, a spatial statistic used to analyze the pattern of points in a given area.

tools.name: geopatra
tools.one_line_profile: Interactive maps wrapper for GeoPandas
tools.detailed_description: A Python library that creates interactive maps using GeoPandas, simplifying the visualization of geospatial dataframes.

tools.name: ice_mat
tools.one_line_profile: Matlab implementation of Iterative Closest Point (ICP)
tools.detailed_description: A Matlab implementation of the Iterative Closest Point (ICP) algorithm for 3D shape registration, useful in spatial analysis and geometric processing.

tools.name: HPGL-GUI
tools.one_line_profile: GUI for High Performance Geostatistics Library
tools.detailed_description: A graphical user interface for the High Performance Geostatistics Library (HPGL), facilitating the use of geostatistical algorithms.

tools.name: spEcula
tools.one_line_profile: Spatial prediction methods in R
tools.detailed_description: An R package providing methods for spatial prediction, supporting geostatistical analysis and interpolation tasks.

tools.name: spInterp
tools.one_line_profile: Spatial interpolation tools in R
tools.detailed_description: An R package dedicated to spatial interpolation techniques, useful for estimating values at unsampled locations in spatial datasets.

tools.name: EnvExpInd
tools.one_line_profile: R package for assessing environmental exposure at the individual level
tools.detailed_description: A repository designed to assess environmental exposure on the individual level, likely providing functions to calculate exposure metrics based on spatial and temporal data.

tools.name: Samβada
tools.one_line_profile: Integrated software for landscape genomic analysis of large datasets
tools.detailed_description: Samβada is a tool for landscape genomic analysis, focusing on the study of local adaptation in relationship with environment and the measure of spatial autocorrelation in environmental and molecular datasets.

tools.name: PackNet-SfM
tools.one_line_profile: Monocular depth estimation and structure-from-motion library
tools.detailed_description: A codebase for self-supervised monocular depth estimation and structure-from-motion (SfM), useful for 3D reconstruction and spatial understanding in robotics and environmental sensing.

tools.name: tsl
tools.one_line_profile: PyTorch library for processing spatiotemporal data
tools.detailed_description: A PyTorch-based library designed for processing spatiotemporal data, providing modules and utilities for building neural networks for tasks like traffic forecasting and environmental monitoring.

tools.name: Environmental Technologies Design Option Tool (ETDOT)
tools.one_line_profile: Models for designing water treatment systems for contaminant removal
tools.detailed_description: Software models that provide engineers with the capability to evaluate and design systems using granular activated carbon or ion exchange resins for removing contaminants like PFAS from water.

tools.name: IO-Model-Builder
tools.one_line_profile: Tool to create environmentally extended input-output models
tools.detailed_description: A tool developed by the USEPA to create environmentally extended input-output models, facilitating the analysis of economic and environmental interactions.

tools.name: spmodel
tools.one_line_profile: R package for spatial statistical modeling and prediction
tools.detailed_description: An R package provided by USEPA for spatial statistical modeling and prediction, enabling users to fit spatial models to data.

tools.name: river-dl
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning model for predicting environmental variables in rivers
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning model framework developed by USGS for predicting environmental variables on river systems, supporting hydrological research and monitoring.

tools.name: TripoSF
tools.one_line_profile: Fast 3D object reconstruction from single image
tools.detailed_description: A transformer-based model for fast and high-quality 3D mesh reconstruction from a single image, applicable in scientific visualization and simulation environments.

tools.name: spatial-kfold
tools.one_line_profile: Spatial resampling library for robust cross-validation
tools.detailed_description: A Python library for performing spatial resampling (spatial k-fold) to ensure robust cross-validation in spatial studies, preventing data leakage due to spatial autocorrelation.

tools.name: GWSDAT
tools.one_line_profile: GroundWater Spatiotemporal Data Analysis Tool
tools.detailed_description: An R-Shiny implementation of the GroundWater Spatiotemporal Data Analysis Tool, used for the visualization and analysis of groundwater monitoring data.

tools.name: Human-Mobility-Analysis
tools.one_line_profile: Toolkit for individual and crowd level human mobility analysis
tools.detailed_description: A toolkit and models for analyzing human mobility based on trajectory data, including destination prediction and calculation of spatiotemporal features like radius of gyration and entropy.

tools.name: NeuroRA
tools.one_line_profile: Python toolbox for multimode neural data representation analysis
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive Python toolbox for representational analysis in neuroscience, including Neural Pattern Similarity (NPS), Representational Similarity Analysis (RSA), and Spatiotemporal Pattern Similarity (STPS).

tools.name: GeoGraph
tools.one_line_profile: Tool for analysing habitat fragmentation using graph theory
tools.detailed_description: GeoGraph builds a geospatially referenced graph from land cover or field survey data to enable graph-based landscape ecology analysis and interactive visualizations, specifically for habitat fragmentation.

tools.name: pySaliencyMap
tools.one_line_profile: Python implementation of Itti's saliency map
tools.detailed_description: A Python library implementing Itti's saliency map algorithm, used for detecting salient features in images, applicable in computer vision and cognitive science research.

tools.name: h3-indexer
tools.one_line_profile: Geospatial data indexing using H3 and PySpark
tools.detailed_description: An open source package for indexing geospatial data using PySpark, Apache Sedona, and the H3 hierarchical spatial indexing system, enabling efficient spatial analysis of large datasets.

tools.name: FRK
tools.one_line_profile: Fixed Rank Kriging for large spatial datasets
tools.detailed_description: An R package for performing Fixed Rank Kriging (FRK), designed to handle large spatial datasets efficiently for spatial prediction and analysis.

tools.name: L7
tools.one_line_profile: Large-scale WebGL-powered geospatial data visualization analysis engine
tools.detailed_description: A geospatial data visualization framework that supports large-scale data rendering and analysis using WebGL, suitable for scientific visualization of geographic information.

tools.name: elsa
tools.one_line_profile: Entropy-based Local Indicator of Spatial Association
tools.detailed_description: An R framework for quantifying entropy-based local indicators of spatial association (ELSA) for both continuous and categorical data, including global spatial structure measurement.

tools.name: rassta
tools.one_line_profile: Raster-based Spatial Stratification Algorithms
tools.detailed_description: An R package for landscape stratification, sampling, and modeling of environmental phenomena using spatial raster data.

tools.name: scanstatistics
tools.one_line_profile: Space-time anomaly detection using scan statistics
tools.detailed_description: An R package implementing scan statistics for detecting space-time anomalies, useful in epidemiology and environmental monitoring.

tools.name: gmmreg
tools.one_line_profile: Robust Point Set Registration Using Gaussian Mixture Models
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of robust point set registration algorithm using Gaussian Mixture Models, applicable in medical imaging and computer vision.

tools.name: BelgiumMaps.StatBel
tools.one_line_profile: Administrative boundaries of Belgium for spatial analysis
tools.detailed_description: An R data package providing administrative boundaries of Belgium based on Open Data from Statistics Belgium, facilitating spatial analysis in the region.

tools.name: BLEEP
tools.one_line_profile: Spatially Resolved Gene Expression Prediction
tools.detailed_description: A tool for predicting spatially resolved gene expression from H&E histology images via bi-modal contrastive learning.

tools.name: neural-flows
tools.one_line_profile: Analysis of brainwave spatiotemporal dynamics
tools.detailed_description: A toolbox for estimation, analysis, and decomposition of brainwave spatiotemporal dynamics, applicable in neuroscience.

tools.name: geofeather
tools.one_line_profile: High-performance file I/O for geospatial data
tools.detailed_description: A Python library for faster file-based I/O of geometry data, designed to work with Geopandas for efficient geospatial data processing.

tools.name: pyKriging
tools.one_line_profile: Python Kriging Toolbox
tools.detailed_description: A user-friendly Python toolbox for Kriging (Gaussian Process Regression), a method of interpolation for which the interpolated values are modeled by a Gaussian process.

tools.name: OpenSTL
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmark and library for Spatio-Temporal Predictive Learning
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive benchmark and library for spatio-temporal predictive learning, supporting various deep learning models for tasks like weather forecasting and traffic prediction.

tools.name: geostatsmodels
tools.one_line_profile: Collection of geostatistical scripts and models
tools.detailed_description: A collection of Python scripts and models for geostatistical analysis, providing implementations for variograms, kriging, and other spatial statistics methods.

tools.name: LUE
tools.one_line_profile: Scientific Database and Environmental Modelling Framework
tools.detailed_description: A physical data model and framework for storing and manipulating large-scale scientific datasets, particularly for environmental modelling and geospatial simulation.

tools.name: geocube
tools.one_line_profile: Tool to convert geopandas vector data into rasterized xarray data
tools.detailed_description: A tool that simplifies the conversion of geospatial vector data (GeoDataFrame) into rasterized multi-dimensional arrays (xarray), facilitating integration of vector and raster analysis.

tools.name: nowcaster
tools.one_line_profile: Nowcasting with INLA for epidemiology
tools.detailed_description: An R package for nowcasting (estimating current status) of epidemiological data using Integrated Nested Laplace Approximations (INLA), useful for disease surveillance.

tools.name: mgwrsar
tools.one_line_profile: GWR and Multiscale GWR with Spatial Autocorrelation
tools.detailed_description: An R package implementing Geographically Weighted Regression (GWR), Mixed GWR, and Multiscale GWR models that account for spatial autocorrelation.

tools.name: rtop
tools.one_line_profile: Interpolation of Data with Variable Spatial Support
tools.detailed_description: An R package for the interpolation of data with variable spatial support (e.g., runoff related to catchments, administrative units), using geostatistical methods.

tools.name: spNNGP
tools.one_line_profile: Spatial Regression Models using Nearest Neighbor Gaussian Processes
tools.detailed_description: An R package for fitting spatial regression models to large datasets using Nearest Neighbor Gaussian Processes (NNGP), enabling scalable spatial analysis.

tools.name: spdep
tools.one_line_profile: Spatial Dependence: Weighting Schemes, Statistics
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive R package for creating spatial weights, calculating spatial autocorrelation statistics (e.g., Moran's I), and fitting spatial regression models.

tools.name: EMS
tools.one_line_profile: CSIRO Environmental Modelling Suite
tools.detailed_description: A suite of environmental modelling tools developed by CSIRO for coastal and environmental simulations.

tools.name: pixel-perfect-sfm
tools.one_line_profile: Pixel-Perfect Structure-from-Motion with Featuremetric Refinement
tools.detailed_description: A tool for high-precision Structure-from-Motion (SfM) that refines camera poses and 3D points using featuremetric error, applicable in geospatial 3D reconstruction.

tools.name: SSNIP
tools.one_line_profile: Spatial Splicing-derived Neoantigen Identifier Pipeline
tools.detailed_description: A bioinformatics pipeline for characterizing neoantigens derived from cancer-specific splicing events, including neojunction calling and neopeptide prediction.

tools.name: hdstats
tools.one_line_profile: High-dimensional statistics for spatial-temporal stacks
tools.detailed_description: A Python library providing multivariate, high-dimensional statistical algorithms and time series analysis tools specifically for spatial-temporal data stacks.

tools.name: census-map-consolidator
tools.one_line_profile: Tool to combine Census blocks into new shapes based on data attributes
tools.detailed_description: A command-line Python tool designed to consolidate US Census blocks into larger, custom shapes. It is useful for spatial aggregation and generating new geospatial units for demographic or environmental analysis.

tools.name: NEXUS
tools.one_line_profile: Cloud-native data-intensive analysis framework for geospatial and temporal science data
tools.detailed_description: NEXUS is a data-intensive analysis framework that handles array-based observational temporal and geospatial artifacts. It leverages cloud computing elasticity and high-performance spatial lookup services to enable large-scale science data analysis without on-the-fly file I/O.

tools.name: lonboard
tools.one_line_profile: Fast, interactive geospatial vector data visualization in Jupyter
tools.detailed_description: A Python library designed for high-performance, interactive visualization of large geospatial vector datasets within Jupyter notebooks. It utilizes deck.gl for rendering, enabling researchers to explore complex spatial data efficiently.

tools.name: pygeotools
tools.one_line_profile: Collection of libraries and utilities for geospatial data processing
tools.detailed_description: A set of Python libraries and command-line utilities for geospatial data processing and analysis. It includes tools for raster warping, manipulation, and analysis, commonly used in remote sensing and glaciology research.

tools.name: ExaGeoStat
tools.one_line_profile: High-performance unified framework for geostatistics on manycore systems
tools.detailed_description: A high-performance computing framework designed for large-scale geostatistical modeling and prediction. It optimizes matrix operations for spatial statistics on manycore systems, enabling the processing of massive geospatial datasets.

tools.name: GeoDataFrames.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Simple geographical vector interaction for Julia
tools.detailed_description: A Julia library that provides a DataFrame-like interface for handling geospatial vector data. It is built on top of ArchGDAL and integrates with the Julia data ecosystem for efficient spatial data manipulation.

tools.name: geostatpy
tools.one_line_profile: Geostatistical Python toolbox mirroring GSLIB functionality
tools.detailed_description: A Python package for geostatistical data analysis and modeling. It provides functions for variogram calculation, kriging, and stochastic simulation, designed to replicate and extend the functionality of the classic GSLIB software.

tools.name: Verde
tools.one_line_profile: Processing and gridding spatial data using machine learning
tools.detailed_description: A Python library for processing and gridding spatial data. It uses a machine-learning inspired approach to perform tasks like interpolation, trend removal, and cross-validation, suitable for geophysics and geospatial analysis.

tools.name: KADAL
tools.one_line_profile: Kriging for Analysis, Design optimization, And expLoration
tools.detailed_description: A Python-based tool for Kriging-based surrogate modeling. It is designed for analysis, design optimization, and exploration in scientific and engineering contexts, supporting various correlation and regression models.

tools.name: SGeMS Mirror
tools.one_line_profile: Mirror of The Stanford Geostatistical Modeling Software (SGeMS)
tools.detailed_description: A source code mirror of SGeMS, a comprehensive software package for 3D geostatistical modeling and simulation. It provides a wide range of geostatistical algorithms for estimation and simulation on regular and irregular grids.

tools.name: MrMoose
tools.one_line_profile: Bayesian SED fitting procedure for multi-wavelength astronomical data
tools.detailed_description: MrMoose is a Spectral Energy Distribution (SED) fitting procedure using a Bayesian framework. It allows fitting user-defined models onto a set of multi-wavelength data, making use of spatial information and upper-limits with a consistent treatment.

tools.name: EcoLogits
tools.one_line_profile: Tracker for energy consumption and environmental footprint of GenAI models
tools.detailed_description: EcoLogits tracks the energy consumption and environmental footprint of using generative AI models through APIs, enabling researchers to assess the ecological impact of AI workflows.

tools.name: geofileops
tools.one_line_profile: Toolbox for fast processing of large geospatial vector files
tools.detailed_description: A Python toolbox designed to process large geospatial vector files efficiently, utilizing parallel processing to speed up spatial operations.

tools.name: dask-geopandas
tools.one_line_profile: Parallel GeoPandas implementation using Dask
tools.detailed_description: Dask-GeoPandas enables parallel processing of geospatial data by extending GeoPandas with Dask, allowing for scalable spatial analysis on large datasets.

tools.name: GeoPandas
tools.one_line_profile: High-level tools for geographic data in Python
tools.detailed_description: GeoPandas extends the datatypes used by pandas to allow spatial operations on geometric types. It makes working with geospatial data in Python easier by providing a high-level interface to standard geospatial libraries.

tools.name: DIVA
tools.one_line_profile: Data-Interpolating Variational Analysis for oceanographic data
tools.detailed_description: DIVA is a software tool dedicated to the spatial interpolation of in situ data in oceanography using a variational inverse method (VIM).

tools.name: DivaPythonTools
tools.one_line_profile: Python interface for the DIVA spatial interpolation software
tools.detailed_description: Provides a Python interface to run the DIVA (Data-Interpolating Variational Analysis) software tool for spatial interpolation, facilitating integration into Python workflows.

tools.name: gisalgs-interpolation
tools.one_line_profile: Collection of spatial interpolation algorithms
tools.detailed_description: A Python library implementing various spatial interpolation methods for geospatial analysis, including IDW and Kriging.

tools.name: glottospace
tools.one_line_profile: R package for geospatial analysis of linguistic data
tools.detailed_description: An R package designed for the geospatial analysis of linguistic data, providing tools to analyze language distribution and spatial patterns.

tools.name: categorical-spatial-interpolation
tools.one_line_profile: R tools for categorical spatial interpolation
tools.detailed_description: An R package providing methods for the spatial interpolation of categorical data, addressing a specific gap in standard geostatistical tools.

tools.name: MOSKopt
tools.one_line_profile: Stochastic black-box optimization using Stochastic Kriging
tools.detailed_description: A MATLAB tool for simulation-based stochastic black-box optimization under uncertainty, utilizing Stochastic Kriging and Monte Carlo simulation.

tools.name: gstlearn
tools.one_line_profile: C++ library for Geostatistics and Machine Learning
tools.detailed_description: A cross-platform C++ library offering comprehensive functionalities for geostatistics and machine learning, including variography, kriging, and simulations.

tools.name: nlmod
tools.one_line_profile: Python package for MODFLOW 6 groundwater models in the Netherlands
tools.detailed_description: A Python package designed to build, run, and visualize MODFLOW 6 groundwater models, specifically tailored for data sources and conditions in the Netherlands.

tools.name: MetaPathways v2.0
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline for environmental Pathway/Genome Database construction
tools.detailed_description: A master-worker model pipeline for constructing Pathway/Genome Databases from environmental metagenomic data, designed for grid and cloud computing environments.

tools.name: STARFM_prediction
tools.one_line_profile: Implementation of the STARFM algorithm for reflectance fusion
tools.detailed_description: Python implementation of the Spatial and Temporal Adaptive Reflectance Fusion Model (STARFM) algorithm, used in remote sensing to fuse high-frequency temporal data with high-resolution spatial data.

tools.name: mbg
tools.one_line_profile: R package for model-based geostatistics
tools.detailed_description: An R package facilitating model-based geostatistics, likely providing tools for spatial modeling and inference.

tools.name: SpatialPandas
tools.one_line_profile: Pandas extension for spatial/geometric operations
tools.detailed_description: Provides pandas extension arrays for spatial and geometric operations, enabling efficient storage and manipulation of spatial data within pandas DataFrames.

tools.name: HPGL
tools.one_line_profile: High Performance Geostatistics Library
tools.detailed_description: A library designed for high-performance geostatistical modeling and simulation, often used in reservoir modeling and earth sciences.

tools.name: R-INLA
tools.one_line_profile: Integrated Nested Laplace Approximations for R
tools.detailed_description: The R-INLA project provides a framework for Bayesian inference using Integrated Nested Laplace Approximations, widely used for spatial and spatio-temporal modeling.

tools.name: STGAT
tools.one_line_profile: Spatial-Temporal Graph Attention Network for trajectory prediction
tools.detailed_description: STGAT models spatial-temporal interactions for human trajectory prediction using graph attention networks, applicable in behavioral analysis and spatial dynamics.

tools.name: hydroPSO
tools.one_line_profile: Particle Swarm Optimisation for environmental models
tools.detailed_description: An R package implementing Model-Independent Particle Swarm Optimisation (PSO), specifically tailored for the calibration and optimization of environmental and hydrological models.

tools.name: FeliX Model
tools.one_line_profile: System dynamics model of global social, economic, and environmental systems
tools.detailed_description: FeliX (Functional Enviro-economic Linkages Integrated neXus) is a system dynamics model that simulates the complex interdependencies between global social, economic, and environmental Earth systems.

tools.name: gpdvega
tools.one_line_profile: Bridge between GeoPandas and Altair for geospatial visualization
tools.detailed_description: A Python library that connects GeoPandas with Altair, enabling seamless and interactive visualization of geospatial data.

tools.name: geobr
tools.one_line_profile: Access to official spatial data sets of Brazil
tools.detailed_description: An R and Python package that provides easy access to official spatial data sets of Brazil, facilitating geospatial analysis and research involving Brazilian geography.

tools.name: geomod3D
tools.one_line_profile: Implicit 3D geological modeling and geostatistics library
tools.detailed_description: A tool for implicit 3D geological modeling and geostatistics, providing capabilities for spatial analysis and structural modeling in geosciences.

tools.name: DDSTGCN
tools.one_line_profile: Dual Dynamic Spatial-Temporal Graph Convolution Network for traffic prediction
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of a deep learning model (DDSTGCN) for spatial-temporal traffic forecasting, utilizing graph convolution networks to capture dynamic spatial dependencies.

tools.name: SpatialDependence.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Julia package for spatial dependence and exploratory spatial data analysis
tools.detailed_description: A Julia library providing tools for calculating spatial weights matrices, testing for spatial autocorrelation (spatial dependence), and performing exploratory spatial data analysis (ESDA).

tools.name: WhiteboxTools
tools.one_line_profile: Advanced geospatial data analysis platform
tools.detailed_description: A command-line program and library for advanced geospatial data analysis, offering a wide range of tools for processing GIS data, hydrological analysis, and terrain analysis.

tools.name: spatial_correction_lavaan
tools.one_line_profile: Method for correcting standard errors for spatial autocorrelation in SEM
tools.detailed_description: An R tool to alter standard errors from spatial autocorrelation using lavaan and ape packages, useful for structural equation modeling in spatial contexts.

tools.name: GeNetIt
tools.one_line_profile: Spatial graph-theoretic gravity modelling package
tools.detailed_description: An R package designed for spatial graph-theoretic gravity modeling, facilitating the analysis of landscape connectivity and gene flow.

tools.name: spatialEco
tools.one_line_profile: Utilities for spatial analysis and ecological modelling
tools.detailed_description: An R package providing a collection of functions for spatial analysis and modeling of ecological systems, including tools for pattern analysis, diversity metrics, and model evaluation.

tools.name: GSI-GNN
tools.one_line_profile: Rainfall Spatial Interpolation with Graph Neural Networks
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of a Graph Neural Network (GNN) based approach for spatial interpolation of rainfall data, as presented in DASFAA 2023.

tools.name: SSIN
tools.one_line_profile: Self-Supervised Learning for Rainfall Spatial Interpolation
tools.detailed_description: Code for the SSIN model, a self-supervised learning framework for spatial interpolation of rainfall data, presented at SIGMOD 2023.

tools.name: geostats-matlab
tools.one_line_profile: MATLAB package for geostatistical data analysis
tools.detailed_description: A MATLAB library for performing geostatistical analysis, including functions for variogram estimation and kriging interpolation.

tools.name: stif
tools.one_line_profile: Space-Time Interpolation and Forecasting library
tools.detailed_description: A Python library for predicting spatio-temporally distributed variables via space-time regression kriging, utilizing numpy and numba for performance.

tools.name: shapefile2gif
tools.one_line_profile: Tool to create animated GIFs from time-annotated shapefiles
tools.detailed_description: A Python script that automatically creates animated GIFs to illustrate the dynamics of time-annotated vector objects (e.g., urban growth) from shapefiles.

tools.name: STGAT Traffic Prediction
tools.one_line_profile: Spatial-Temporal Graph Attention Networks for Traffic Forecasting
tools.detailed_description: Open source implementation of the Spatio-Temporal Graph Attention Networks (STGAT) for traffic forecasting, enabling analysis of complex spatial-temporal dependencies.

tools.name: pyInterpolate
tools.one_line_profile: Spatial interpolation Python package
tools.detailed_description: A Python package dedicated to spatial interpolation methods, providing tools for estimating values at unsampled locations.

tools.name: GeoClustering.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Geostatistical clustering methods for Julia
tools.detailed_description: A package within the GeoStats.jl framework providing geostatistical clustering methods for spatial data analysis.

tools.name: GeoStatsSolvers.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Solvers for the GeoStats.jl framework
tools.detailed_description: A collection of built-in solvers for the GeoStats.jl framework, enabling various geostatistical estimation and simulation tasks.

tools.name: KrigingEstimators.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Kriging estimators for GeoStats.jl
tools.detailed_description: A Julia package providing various Kriging estimators (e.g., Simple, Ordinary, Universal) for the GeoStats.jl framework.

tools.name: Variography.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Variogram analysis for GeoStats.jl
tools.detailed_description: A Julia package for variography, allowing for the estimation and modeling of variograms within the GeoStats.jl framework.

tools.name: geopandas_osm
tools.one_line_profile: OSM data query tool for GeoPandas
tools.detailed_description: A Python library to query the OpenStreetMap Overpass API and retrieve data directly as a GeoPandas GeoDataFrame, facilitating geospatial data acquisition.

tools.name: StretchBEV
tools.one_line_profile: Spatially and Temporally consistent instance prediction model
tools.detailed_description: Official implementation of StretchBEV, a model for stretching future instance prediction spatially and temporally, typically used in autonomous driving perception but applicable to spatial-temporal prediction tasks.

tools.name: spatial_stats
tools.one_line_profile: Spatial Statistics Library for ActiveRecord/PostGIS
tools.detailed_description: A Ruby library that adds spatial statistical capabilities to ActiveRecord models using PostGIS, enabling database-level spatial analysis.

tools.name: kepler.gl
tools.one_line_profile: Large-scale geospatial analysis and visualization tool
tools.detailed_description: A powerful open-source geospatial analysis tool for large-scale data sets, allowing users to visualize and explore geospatial data with high performance.

tools.name: road_regularization
tools.one_line_profile: Road network simplification and regularization tool
tools.detailed_description: A tool for processing road network data, including simplification, converting multi-lines to single lines, detecting dead-ends, and optimizing road networks for spatial analysis.

tools.name: OPERA
tools.one_line_profile: QSAR model prediction tool for environmental and toxicological endpoints
tools.detailed_description: An application providing QSAR model predictions, applicability domain, and accuracy assessment for physicochemical properties, environmental fate, and toxicological endpoints.

tools.name: satellite_image_analyze
tools.one_line_profile: Satellite image analysis library
tools.detailed_description: A C++ library for analyzing satellite images, including functions for FFT and variogram calculation, useful for remote sensing and geostatistics.

tools.name: sxl
tools.one_line_profile: Spatially explicit learning of geographic processes
tools.detailed_description: A Python library for spatially explicit learning, enabling the modeling of geographic processes with auxiliary tasks.

tools.name: radiomap-construction
tools.one_line_profile: Radio map construction using Kriging interpolation
tools.detailed_description: Python code for constructing radio maps using Kriging interpolation, applying geostatistical methods to signal propagation analysis.

tools.name: SelfMotion
tools.one_line_profile: Self-Supervised Class-Agnostic Motion Prediction
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of a self-supervised motion prediction model with spatial and temporal consistency regularizations, applicable to analyzing dynamic spatial phenomena.

tools.name: CNN-LSTM_for_DSM
tools.one_line_profile: CNN-LSTM model for Digital Soil Mapping
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning model (CNN-LSTM) implementation for predicting soil organic carbon content using long time series of MODIS-based phenological variables.

tools.name: SpatialImageService
tools.one_line_profile: AQI spatial interpolation map rendering service
tools.detailed_description: A service based on Node Canvas for rendering spatial interpolation maps of Air Quality Index (AQI), facilitating environmental monitoring visualization.

tools.name: libKriging
tools.one_line_profile: High-performance C++ library for Kriging (Gaussian Process Regression)
tools.detailed_description: A C++ library designed for high-performance Kriging operations, providing bindings for multiple languages (R, Python, Octave, Matlab). It focuses on efficient spatial interpolation and geostatistical modeling.

tools.name: sdmpredictors
tools.one_line_profile: R package for accessing environmental predictors for species distribution modeling
tools.detailed_description: A utility package to facilitate the retrieval and processing of environmental datasets (marine and terrestrial) specifically for Species Distribution Modelling (SDM).

tools.name: chronnets
tools.one_line_profile: Network-based model for spatiotemporal data analysis
tools.detailed_description: An R package implementing a network-based approach to analyze spatiotemporal data, converting time series of spatial grids into chron networks to study dynamics.

tools.name: TimeSformer-pytorch
tools.one_line_profile: PyTorch implementation of TimeSformer for video classification
tools.detailed_description: An implementation of the TimeSformer architecture, a pure attention-based model for video classification. While general-purpose, it is applicable to scientific video data analysis (e.g., monitoring, remote sensing time series).

tools.name: STCOcc
tools.one_line_profile: Sparse Spatial-Temporal Cascade Renovation for 3D Occupancy Prediction
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of the CVPR2025 paper STCOcc, a method for 3D occupancy and scene flow prediction using sparse spatial-temporal cascade renovation, relevant for autonomous systems and spatial modeling.

tools.name: opengxt
tools.one_line_profile: Spatial analysis tools for GeoTools and GeoServer
tools.detailed_description: A Java library providing spatial analysis tools and statistics toolbox compatible with GeoTools, GeoServer WPS, and uDig.

tools.name: OpenSfM
tools.one_line_profile: Open source Structure-from-Motion pipeline
tools.detailed_description: A Structure-from-Motion (SfM) library for reconstructing 3D camera poses and geometry from images, widely used in geospatial mapping and photogrammetry.

tools.name: geopandas-view
tools.one_line_profile: Interactive exploration tool for GeoPandas GeoDataFrames
tools.detailed_description: A Python tool for quickly visualizing and exploring GeoPandas GeoDataFrames interactively, aiding in geospatial data analysis workflows.

tools.name: matlab-interpolation-toolkit
tools.one_line_profile: MATLAB toolkit for scattered data interpolation
tools.detailed_description: A collection of MATLAB functions for interpolating scattered data using various methods, useful for spatial data analysis and surface generation.

tools.name: pysaliency
tools.one_line_profile: Python framework for saliency modeling and evaluation
tools.detailed_description: A framework for modeling and evaluating visual saliency, which can be applied to analyzing visual attention in various scientific contexts including remote sensing or behavioral studies.

tools.name: SFA3D
tools.one_line_profile: Super Fast and Accurate 3D Object Detection from LiDAR
tools.detailed_description: A PyTorch implementation for 3D object detection based on LiDAR point clouds, relevant for spatial sensing and autonomous environmental monitoring.

tools.name: FastGeospatial
tools.one_line_profile: PostGIS geospatial API for Python
tools.detailed_description: A Python API designed to enable efficient geospatial analysis on geographical data stored within a PostGIS spatial database.

tools.name: scikit-gstat
tools.one_line_profile: Geostatistical variogram estimation library
tools.detailed_description: A Python library for geostatistical analysis, focusing on variogram estimation and modeling, designed to fit into the SciPy ecosystem.

tools.name: insight-editor
tools.one_line_profile: Open source geospatial analysis platform
tools.detailed_description: A web-based platform for large-scale geospatial data analysis and visualization, leveraging Kepler.gl and DuckDB, serving as an alternative to commercial GIS platforms.

tools.name: movingpandas
tools.one_line_profile: Trajectory analysis library based on GeoPandas
tools.detailed_description: A Python library for handling movement data, providing trajectory classes and functions built on top of GeoPandas for spatiotemporal analysis.

tools.name: dask-geopandas
tools.one_line_profile: Parallelized GeoPandas with Dask
tools.detailed_description: A library that scales GeoPandas operations to multiple cores or clusters using Dask, enabling high-performance geospatial data processing.

tools.name: gpd_lite_toolbox
tools.one_line_profile: Convenience toolbox for GeoPandas
tools.detailed_description: A lightweight toolbox providing additional convenience functions and utilities for working with GeoPandas GeoDataFrames.

tools.name: spatiotemporal
tools.one_line_profile: Tools for spatial and temporal autocorrelation
tools.detailed_description: A Python library providing tools to calculate and analyze spatial and temporal autocorrelation in data.

tools.name: spatial-analysis
tools.one_line_profile: Collection of geospatial analysis algorithms
tools.detailed_description: A library of geospatial analysis algorithms written in C and wrapped in Python, providing efficient implementations for various spatial tasks.

tools.name: Geospatial Analysis Integrity Tool (GAIT)
tools.one_line_profile: Data validation tool for geospatial data models and metadata
tools.detailed_description: The Geospatial Analysis Integrity Tool (GAIT) validates data against specific data models, checking geometry, feature codes, attribute values, domains, and metadata. It supports MGCP, GIFD, TDS, and VMap data models and outputs results as shapefiles.

tools.name: h3ronpy
tools.one_line_profile: Python bindings for the H3 geospatial grid system
tools.detailed_description: A data science toolkit providing Python bindings for the H3 geospatial grid system, enabling efficient spatial indexing and analysis.

tools.name: simple-data-analysis
tools.one_line_profile: TypeScript library for tabular and geospatial data analysis
tools.detailed_description: A high-performance TypeScript library designed for data analysis, supporting tabular, geospatial, and vector data processing tasks.

tools.name: kriging.js
tools.one_line_profile: JavaScript library for geospatial prediction via ordinary kriging
tools.detailed_description: A JavaScript library implementing ordinary kriging for geospatial prediction and mapping, allowing for spatial interpolation in web environments.

tools.name: SpatialPPIv2
tools.one_line_profile: Protein-protein interaction prediction using graph neural networks
tools.detailed_description: A tool for predicting protein-protein interactions by combining graph neural networks with protein language models, focusing on spatial context.

tools.name: turfpy
tools.one_line_profile: Python library for geospatial analysis reimplementing turf.js
tools.detailed_description: A Python library that reimplements the functionality of turf.js, providing a wide range of geospatial analysis functions for processing GeoJSON data.

tools.name: pygslib
tools.one_line_profile: Python wrapper for GSLIB geostatistical library
tools.detailed_description: A Python package that wraps GSLIB Fortran code, providing tools for geostatistical analysis, including variography and kriging.

tools.name: scikit-map
tools.one_line_profile: Scikit-learn extension for spatial prediction and mapping
tools.detailed_description: A library that applies scikit-learn machine learning models to mapping and spatial prediction tasks, facilitating geospatial data analysis.

tools.name: PCRaster
tools.one_line_profile: Software for environmental modeling and dynamic simulation
tools.detailed_description: A collection of software tools for environmental modeling, specifically designed for the development and deployment of spatio-temporal environmental models.

tools.name: geostatistical_delta-GLMM
tools.one_line_profile: Geostatistical analysis tool for survey data abundance estimation
tools.detailed_description: A tool designed for geostatistical analysis of survey data, specifically for estimating indices of abundance using delta-GLMM models.

tools.name: GISportal
tools.one_line_profile: Web-based GIS tool for visualization and analysis
tools.detailed_description: A web-based GIS portal designed for the visualization and analysis of geospatial data, facilitating access to environmental datasets.

tools.name: TBSS
tools.one_line_profile: Tract-based spatial statistics pipeline
tools.detailed_description: A pipeline for Tract-Based Spatial Statistics (TBSS) using ANTs and FSL, designed for neuroimaging analysis of diffusion MRI data.

tools.name: polatory
tools.one_line_profile: Fast RBF interpolation and kriging for large scale data
tools.detailed_description: A C++ library for fast radial basis function (RBF) interpolation and kriging, optimized for processing large-scale geospatial datasets.

tools.name: e-footprint
tools.one_line_profile: Toolkit for modeling environmental impact of digital services
tools.detailed_description: A toolkit designed to exhaustively model and assess the environmental impact (carbon footprint, etc.) of digital services and infrastructure.

tools.name: pygeoops
tools.one_line_profile: Library for extended spatial operations
tools.detailed_description: A Python library providing less common or extended spatial functions and operations for geospatial data processing.

tools.name: pyrosm
tools.one_line_profile: Fast OpenStreetMap data reader for Python
tools.detailed_description: A Python library for reading OpenStreetMap data from Protobuf files into GeoDataFrames efficiently, facilitating large-scale OSM data analysis.

tools.name: esda
tools.one_line_profile: Exploratory Spatial Data Analysis library
tools.detailed_description: A Python library within the PySAL ecosystem for Exploratory Spatial Data Analysis (ESDA), providing statistics for spatial autocorrelation and other spatial patterns.

tools.name: giddy
tools.one_line_profile: Geospatial distribution dynamics analysis library
tools.detailed_description: A Python library for exploratory spatiotemporal data analysis and the analysis of geospatial distribution dynamics, part of the PySAL family.

tools.name: pointpats
tools.one_line_profile: Planar Point Pattern Analysis library
tools.detailed_description: A Python library for analyzing planar point patterns, providing statistical methods to study the spatial arrangement of points.

tools.name: PySAL
tools.one_line_profile: Python Spatial Analysis Library Meta-Package
tools.detailed_description: The meta-package for the Python Spatial Analysis Library (PySAL), providing a unified entry point to a federation of packages for spatial statistics, econometrics, and analysis.

tools.name: spaghetti
tools.one_line_profile: Spatial Graphs: Networks, Topology, & Inference
tools.detailed_description: A Python library for the analysis of spatial graphs, networks, and topology, supporting network-constrained spatial statistics.

tools.name: splot
tools.one_line_profile: Lightweight plotting for geospatial analysis in PySAL
tools.detailed_description: splot provides statistical visualizations for spatial analysis, serving as a visual interface for the PySAL ecosystem to map and chart spatial data.

tools.name: spreg
tools.one_line_profile: Spatial econometric regression in Python
tools.detailed_description: spreg is a PySAL module for estimating spatial regression models, including OLS, 2SLS, and GM methods for spatial lag and error models.

tools.name: gstat
tools.one_line_profile: Spatial and spatio-temporal geostatistical modelling, prediction and simulation
tools.detailed_description: gstat is a comprehensive R package for geostatistical modelling, including variogram analysis, kriging (simple, ordinary, universal), and conditional simulation.

tools.name: sf
tools.one_line_profile: Simple Features for R
tools.detailed_description: sf provides a standardized way to encode spatial vector data in R, implementing the Simple Features standard for storage and manipulation of geometric objects.

tools.name: spdep
tools.one_line_profile: Spatial Dependence: Weighting Schemes and Statistics
tools.detailed_description: spdep is an R package for creating spatial weights, testing for spatial autocorrelation (e.g., Moran's I), and fitting spatial regression models.

tools.name: sknifedatar
tools.one_line_profile: Extension to the modeltime ecosystem for spatial data visualization and analysis
tools.detailed_description: sknifedatar extends the modeltime ecosystem in R, providing utilities for spatial data handling and visualization to support time series forecasting and modeling.

tools.name: ArchPy
tools.one_line_profile: Stochastic geological modeling library
tools.detailed_description: ArchPy is a Python library for stochastic geological modeling, allowing the simulation of stratigraphic units and lithologies using geostatistical methods.

tools.name: DeepSpot
tools.one_line_profile: Leveraging Spatial Context for Enhanced Spatial Transcriptomics Prediction
tools.detailed_description: DeepSpot is a deep learning tool that leverages spatial context from H&E images to enhance spot prediction in spatial transcriptomics data.

tools.name: MetaCerberus
tools.one_line_profile: Functional Ontology Assignments for Metagenomes via HMM
tools.detailed_description: MetaCerberus is a pipeline for versatile functional ontology assignments for metagenomes, utilizing Hidden Markov Models (HMM) with a focus on environmental shotgun metaomics data.

tools.name: cokriging
tools.one_line_profile: MATLAB implementation of the co-kriging process
tools.detailed_description: A MATLAB implementation of the co-kriging process using the DACE toolbox, enabling multi-fidelity modeling and interpolation.

tools.name: pysgems
tools.one_line_profile: Python interface for SGeMS (Stanford Geostatistical Modeling Software)
tools.detailed_description: pysgems allows users to automate and utilize SGeMS (Stanford Geostatistical Modeling Software) algorithms and functionalities directly from Python scripts.

tools.name: quadkeyr
tools.one_line_profile: Tools for converting QuadKey-identified data to raster images
tools.detailed_description: quadkeyr is an R package designed to process QuadKey-identified data (Bing Maps Tile System) and convert it into raster images, facilitating the analysis of datasets like Facebook mobility data.

tools.name: skspatial
tools.one_line_profile: Simple functions for spatial interpolation using machine learning
tools.detailed_description: skspatial provides simple Python functions to perform spatial interpolation using machine learning techniques, integrating with scikit-learn.

tools.name: terra
tools.one_line_profile: Methods for spatial data analysis with raster and vector data
tools.detailed_description: terra is a robust R package for spatial data handling, replacing the 'raster' package. It provides fast methods for raster and vector data manipulation and analysis.

tools.name: PySALT
tools.one_line_profile: Reduction and analysis software for SALT (Southern African Large Telescope) data
tools.detailed_description: PySALT is the primary software package for the reduction and analysis of astronomical data from the Southern African Large Telescope (SALT).

tools.name: EOReader
tools.one_line_profile: Remote-sensing library reading optical and SAR sensors in a sensor-agnostic way
tools.detailed_description: EOReader is a Python library designed to read and process optical and SAR remote sensing data in a sensor-agnostic manner, handling band loading, cloud masking, and spectral indices.

tools.name: SfePy
tools.one_line_profile: Simple Finite Elements in Python for solving PDEs
tools.detailed_description: SfePy is a software for solving systems of coupled partial differential equations (PDEs) by the finite element method in 1D, 2D and 3D.

tools.name: Bundler
tools.one_line_profile: Structure from Motion (SfM) toolkit for 3D reconstruction
tools.detailed_description: Bundler is a structure-from-motion (SfM) system for unordered image collections, used to reconstruct 3D geometry and camera parameters from photographs.

tools.name: spatstat
tools.one_line_profile: Comprehensive R package for analyzing spatial point patterns
tools.detailed_description: spatstat is a major R library for the statistical analysis of spatial point patterns, supporting a wide range of models, tests, and visualization methods.

tools.name: spatstat.core
tools.one_line_profile: Core functionality for data analysis and modelling in spatstat
tools.detailed_description: spatstat.core contains the core statistical methods for the spatstat family, focusing on model fitting, simulation, and inference for spatial point processes.

tools.name: spatstat.data
tools.one_line_profile: Dataset component of the spatstat R package for spatial point pattern analysis
tools.detailed_description: A sub-package of the spatstat ecosystem containing standard datasets used for demonstrating, testing, and benchmarking spatial statistical methods and point pattern analysis techniques.

tools.name: spatstat.geom
tools.one_line_profile: Core geometry definitions and operations for the spatstat package
tools.detailed_description: A sub-package of spatstat that defines spatial data types (such as windows, pixel images, and point patterns) and provides fundamental geometrical operations for spatial analysis.

tools.name: spatstat.linnet
tools.one_line_profile: Extension for spatstat to handle point patterns on linear networks
tools.detailed_description: A sub-package of spatstat specifically designed for defining and analyzing linear networks (such as road networks) and spatial point patterns occurring on them.

tools.name: spatstat.model
tools.one_line_profile: Parametric modeling and inference module for spatstat
tools.detailed_description: A sub-package of spatstat containing functionality for fitting parametric models to spatial point pattern data, performing statistical inference, and model validation.

tools.name: spatstat.random
tools.one_line_profile: Random point pattern generation module for spatstat
tools.detailed_description: A sub-package of spatstat providing functions for generating random spatial point patterns according to various stochastic models, essential for simulation and Monte Carlo tests.

tools.name: spatstat.sphere
tools.one_line_profile: Extension for spatstat to handle point patterns on the sphere
tools.detailed_description: An extension package for spatstat that enables the analysis of point patterns on the surface of a sphere, useful for global-scale geospatial data.

tools.name: spatstat.utils
tools.one_line_profile: Utility functions for the spatstat ecosystem
tools.detailed_description: A sub-package of spatstat containing low-level utility functions and helper methods used across the spatstat family of packages.

tools.name: STK
tools.one_line_profile: Small Toolbox for Kriging interpolation and regression in MATLAB
tools.detailed_description: A MATLAB toolbox focused on Kriging interpolation and regression, closely related to Splines and Radial Basis Functions, interpreting them as non-parametric Bayesian methods using Gaussian Processes.

tools.name: stpp
tools.one_line_profile: R package for space-time point pattern simulation, visualisation and analysis
tools.detailed_description: An R package providing tools for the analysis of space-time point patterns, including simulation of models, visualization of 3D patterns, and statistical testing.

tools.name: TISSUE
tools.one_line_profile: Uncertainty estimation tool for spatial transcriptomics gene expression predictions
tools.detailed_description: TISSUE (Transcript Imputation with Spatial Single-cell Uncertainty Estimation) provides tools for estimating well-calibrated uncertainty measures for gene expression predictions in single-cell spatial transcriptomics datasets.

tools.name: polire
tools.one_line_profile: Python library for spatial interpolation methods
tools.detailed_description: A Python library that provides a unified interface for various spatial interpolation techniques, including IDW, Kriging, and Splines, facilitating geospatial data analysis.

tools.name: TheiaSfM
tools.one_line_profile: Library for multiview geometry and structure from motion
tools.detailed_description: An open-source C++ library for multiview geometry and structure from motion (SfM), providing efficient and accurate tools for 3D reconstruction from images.

tools.name: rastercube
tools.one_line_profile: Python library for big data analysis of georeferenced time series data
tools.detailed_description: A Python library designed for efficient processing and analysis of large-scale georeferenced time series data, such as MODIS NDVI satellite imagery.

tools.name: geowrangler
tools.one_line_profile: Python package for wrangling and processing geospatial datasets
tools.detailed_description: A Python package specifically designed for wrangling geospatial datasets, offering tools for spatial joins, feature engineering, and data preparation for geospatial machine learning.

tools.name: INLAutils
tools.one_line_profile: Utility functions for the R-INLA package for Bayesian spatial modeling
tools.detailed_description: An R package providing helper functions and utilities to facilitate the use of R-INLA for fitting spatial and spatio-temporal models, including visualization and result processing.

tools.name: SfMLearner
tools.one_line_profile: Framework for unsupervised learning of depth and ego-motion from video
tools.detailed_description: An unsupervised learning framework for estimating depth and ego-motion from monocular video sequences, widely used as a baseline in spatial structure learning and photogrammetry.

tools.name: DISSTANS
tools.one_line_profile: Toolbox for decomposition and inference of sources in spatiotemporal network signals
tools.detailed_description: A Python toolbox for the Decomposition and Inference of Sources through Spatiotemporal Analysis of Network Signals, useful for analyzing propagation on networks.

tools.name: spatial-interpolators
tools.one_line_profile: Python functions for spatial interpolation on Cartesian and spherical grids
tools.detailed_description: A collection of Python functions to perform spatial interpolation of data over Cartesian and spherical grids, supporting various interpolation schemes.

tools.name: giga-spatial
tools.one_line_profile: Toolkit for scalable geospatial data processing and enrichment
tools.detailed_description: A toolkit developed by UNICEF Giga for scalable geospatial data download, processing, and enrichment, supporting infrastructure mapping and accessibility analysis.

tools.name: tidycensus
tools.one_line_profile: R package to load US Census boundary and attribute data as tidyverse-ready data frames
tools.detailed_description: An R package that allows users to interface with the US Census Bureau's API and return data in tidyverse-ready data frames, optionally including geometric data for spatial analysis.

tools.name: H_Kriging
tools.one_line_profile: MATLAB implementation of Hierarchical Kriging model
tools.detailed_description: A MATLAB code implementation for the Hierarchical Kriging model, a variable fidelity surrogate model that serves as an improved version of co-Kriging for geostatistical analysis.

tools.name: SpaDiT
tools.one_line_profile: Diffusion Transformer for Spatial Gene Expression Prediction
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning model based on Diffusion Transformers for predicting spatial gene expression from scRNA-seq data, bridging the gap between single-cell sequencing and spatial transcriptomics.

tools.name: pyGeoStatistics
tools.one_line_profile: Python library for geostatistical analysis
tools.detailed_description: A Python library implementing various geostatistical methods, including variogram calculation and Kriging interpolation, designed for spatial data analysis.

tools.name: policy-data-analyzer
tools.one_line_profile: NLP framework for analyzing environmental policy incentives
tools.detailed_description: An extensible framework using NLP and active learning to recognize incentives for landscape restoration in environmental policies, supporting scraping, preprocessing, and text analysis.

tools.name: variogramfit
tools.one_line_profile: MATLAB tool for fitting theoretical variograms
tools.detailed_description: A MATLAB function to fit different theoretical variogram models to experimental variograms, a fundamental step in geostatistical modeling and Kriging.

tools.name: jcontour
tools.one_line_profile: Java library for meteorological contour plotting and interpolation
tools.detailed_description: A Java-based tool for visualizing and analyzing meteorological data, integrating Inverse Distance Weighting (IDW) and Ordinary Kriging interpolation algorithms for contour generation.

tools.name: V-FloodNet
tools.one_line_profile: Video segmentation system for urban flood detection
tools.detailed_description: A PyTorch implementation of a video segmentation system designed for detecting and quantifying urban floods, supporting environmental monitoring and disaster management.

tools.name: cartes
tools.one_line_profile: Python library for creating maps with OpenStreetMap data
tools.detailed_description: A Python library that facilitates the creation of maps using OpenStreetMap data, suitable for geospatial visualization and analysis.

tools.name: GeoHD
tools.one_line_profile: Toolkit for geospatial hotspot detection and analysis
tools.detailed_description: A Python toolkit designed for geospatial hotspot detection, visualization, and analysis using urban data, aiding in spatial pattern recognition.

tools.name: AQuA2
tools.one_line_profile: Analysis tool for molecular spatiotemporal signals
tools.detailed_description: A MATLAB-based tool for Activity Quantification and Analysis (AQuA) of molecular spatiotemporal signals, particularly useful in analyzing dynamic biological events.

tools.name: Incremental_Kriging_Assisted_Evolutionary_Algorithm
tools.one_line_profile: Kriging-assisted evolutionary algorithm for optimization
tools.detailed_description: A MATLAB implementation of a fast Kriging-assisted evolutionary algorithm based on incremental learning, useful for computationally expensive optimization problems in engineering and science.

tools.name: INCREASE
tools.one_line_profile: Inductive Graph Representation Learning for Spatio-Temporal Kriging
tools.detailed_description: A Python implementation of the INCREASE model, which uses inductive graph representation learning for spatio-temporal Kriging, enabling interpolation in spatial data.

tools.name: pretty_gpd
tools.one_line_profile: Utility for plotting GeoPandas dataframes
tools.detailed_description: A lightweight Python utility function to enhance the plotting capabilities of GeoPandas dataframes, facilitating quick geospatial data visualization.

tools.name: DetectorFreeSfM
tools.one_line_profile: Detector-Free Structure from Motion pipeline
tools.detailed_description: A Python implementation of a detector-free Structure from Motion (SfM) pipeline, used for 3D reconstruction from 2D images, applicable in geosciences and photogrammetry.

tools.name: CNN-LSTM_for_DSM
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning model for Digital Soil Mapping
tools.detailed_description: A CNN-LSTM deep learning model designed for digital soil mapping (DSM), specifically for predicting soil organic carbon content using long time series of remote sensing variables.
